mapper.select: SELECT NO ,NAME ,INFO ,TO_CHAR(ENROLLDATE, 'YYYY') AS ENROLLDATE ,TO_CHAR(MODIFYDATE, 'YYYY') AS MODIFYDATE ,STATUS ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,CAPACITY FROM MEETINGROOM WHERE STATUS IN ('O', 'S')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEETINGROOM (NO, NAME, INFO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME, CAPACITY) VALUES (SEQ_MEETINGROOM_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{info},#{originName},#{changeName}, #{capacity})
mapper.select: SELECT NO ,NAME ,INFO ,TO_CHAR(ENROLLDATE, 'YYYY') AS ENROLLDATE ,TO_CHAR(MODIFYDATE, 'YYYY') AS MODIFYDATE ,STATUS ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,CAPACITY FROM MEETINGROOM WHERE STATUS IN ('O', 'S') AND NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEETINGROOM SET NAME = #{name}, INFO = #{info}, ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName}, CHANGE_NAME = #{changeName}, CAPACITY = #{capacity}, MODIFYDATE = SYSDATE WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT MR.NO ,MR.MEETINGROOM_NO ,MR.USER_NO ,MR."DATE" ,MR.START_TIME ,LPAD(MR.END_TIME, 2, '0') || ':00' AS END_TIME ,MR.STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION MR JOIN MEETINGROOM M ON MR.MEETINGROOM_NO = M.NO WHERE MR.STATUS = 0 AND MR.MEETINGROOM_NO = #{meetingroomNo} AND MR."DATE" = #{date}
SELECT NO ,MEETINGROOM_NO ,USER_NO ,"DATE" ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,STATUS FROM MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION WHERE MEETINGROOM_NO = #{meetingroomNo} AND "DATE" = #{date} AND STATUS = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CALENDAR ( "NO", "USER_NO", "TYPE_NO", "REV_NO", "TITLE", "CONTENT", "START_TIME", "END_TIME", "PLACE", "STATUS", "ALL_DAY" ) VALUES ( SEQ_CALENDAR_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, 3, NULL, '회의', NULL, CASE WHEN #{startTime} BETWEEN 9 AND 12 THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date} || ' ' || LPAD(#{startTime}, 2, '0') || ':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHEN #{startTime} BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date} || ' ' || LPAD(#{startTime} + 12, 2, '0') || ':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') END, CASE WHEN #{startTime} BETWEEN 9 AND 12 THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date} || ' ' || LPAD(#{startTime}, 2, '0') || ':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') + INTERVAL '1' HOUR WHEN #{startTime} BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{date} || ' ' || LPAD(#{startTime} + 12, 2, '0') || ':00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') + INTERVAL '1' HOUR END, (SELECT "NAME" FROM "MEETINGROOM" WHERE "NO" = #{meetingroomNo}), 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT MR.NO ,MR.MEETINGROOM_NO ,MR.USER_NO ,TO_CHAR(MR."DATE", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "DATE" , CASE WHEN MR.START_TIME BETWEEN 9 AND 12 THEN (LPAD(MR.START_TIME, 2, '0') || ':00') WHEN MR.START_TIME BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN (LPAD(MR.START_TIME + 12, 2, '0') || ':00') END AS START_TIME , CASE WHEN MR.START_TIME BETWEEN 9 AND 12 THEN (LPAD(MR.START_TIME + 1, 2, '0') || ':00') WHEN MR.START_TIME BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN (LPAD(MR.START_TIME + 13, 2, '0') || ':00') END AS END_TIME ,MR.STATUS ,M.NAME FROM MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION MR JOIN "USER" U ON MR.USER_NO = U.NO JOIN MEETINGROOM M ON M.NO = MR.MEETINGROOM_NO WHERE MR.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND MR.STATUS = 0
